text.config.aitconfig.title: Adventures in Time
text.config.aitconfig.option.searchHeigh: How many blocks up and down a TARDIS should ground search for before giving up
text.config.aitconfig.option.askDelay.to:
How many seconds a client should be on delay for before asking for another TARDIS
Higher -> Better server performance
Lower -> Less client sync issues
text.config.aitconfig.option.force_sync_:
How many seconds a client should be away from a tardis for before forcing a resync
Higher -> Better server performance
Lower -> Less client sync issues
text.config.aitconfig.option.CUSTOM_MENU: Whether the custom title screen should show
screen.ait.security.title: Security
